title: The wages of faithlessness
author: VD
content_html: The Conservative Party in the UK is melting down due to its faithlessness and refusal to deliver the Brexit for which the people voted. They’ll be punished tomorrow in the European elections that should never have taken place, and hopefully to a similar extent in the next general election.
